0.1.name: wordpress/primal-for-wp
0.1.description:
Want to engage your readership on a whole new level? Provide highly relevant news and information from across the Web, tailored specifically to your individual interests.

Primal for WordPress will allow you to unlock the power of your WordPress site's interest graph to deliver your readers highly relevant and frequently updated information, tailored to each individual page.

By speaking to Primal's data service directly, the plugin allows users to build rich interest graphs around individual pages and filter news and information from across the Web.

Features and Differences

The Primal for WordPress plugin gives publishers the ability to deliver news and information from across the Web, tailored to each individual page within your WordPress site. Unlike other WordPress plugins that recommend related content, Primal's plugin provides you the ability to:

  • Target the related content to the specific subject matter of each indiv
